name: Knowledge Base – Best Documentation and FAQs Plugin with AI Assistance
author: Echo Plugins

sections.description:
Our Knowledge Base plugin is a powerful documentation tool that helps you create and organize your documentation, FAQs, and articles. It’s easy to use and includes many features to help you build a visually appealing Knowledge Base.

Designed with a modern and professional appearance by default, it also offers numerous customization options to align with your brand’s identity. Features include premade designs, popular articles, a Table of Contents (TOC), FAQs, a navigation sidebar, analytics, and customizable archive pages.

Our Knowledge Base is optimized for search engines. See our documentation for details on how this is achieved. The plugin supports multilingual and RTL languages, ensuring accessibility for an international audience. Our articles are responsive and retina-ready, ensuring your knowledge base looks great on all devices.

Examples of Included Professional Layouts
* Basic Layout here
* Tabs Layout here (Multi Product Example)
* Drill Down Layout here
* Classic Layout – Demo 4 here
* Category Focused Layout – Demo 5 here

See our knowledgebase documentation here

KEY FEATURES

✅ Fast search bar with listed results

✅ Five levels of hierarchical documentation

✅ Article view counter with Popular and Recent Articles (NEW)

✅ FAQs Module and Shortcode (NEW)

✅ Professional layouts including Basic, Tabs, Category Focused, Classic (NEW) and Drill Down (NEW)

✅ Customizable Category Archive Page

✅ Articles with breadcrumb, back button, navigation, print button, TOC and more

✅ Navigation sidebar listing categories and articles

✅ AI Content Writing Like ChatGPT

⭐ MORE FEATURES

  • Set up in minutes
  • Organize your documentation by team, product, and service using the Tabs Layout
  • Order articles and categories alphabetically, chronologically, or in any other order using drag and drop.
  • Optimized for the best SEO results to enhance online visibility
  • Counts your Article Views and displays Popular and Recent Articles
  • Analytics to track your Knowledge Base usage
  • Supports RTL languages, WCAG accessibility standards, and works with WPML and Polylang
  • Responsive design that works with any theme and mobile devices
  • Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) Module and shortcode.
  • Articles Index Directory shortcodes. Learn More
  • Change typography (font family and size) for article and category names, TOC, breadcrumbs, and more.

💡 Get help with writing your FAQs using ChatGPT AI

  • Check your spelling and grammar with GPT.
  • Verify spelling and grammar, and generate article outlines.

💡 EASY TO STYLE WITH PRE-MADE DESIGNS

  • Choose from 26 professional pre-made designs, no coding required.
  • Enjoy a variety of colors, styles, and layouts.
  • Switch between designs with a single click.
  • Choose from Basic, Tabs, Category Focused, Classic and Drill Down layouts.

💡 WORKS WITH BUILDERS

  • Compatible with Elementor and Gutenberg Blocks
  • Works with Beaver Builder, Divi, Visual Composer, and others.

💡 HELP DIALOG CHAT INTEGRATION

The free Help Dialog Chat plugin offers a chatbot-like dialog for better customer support and increased leads and sales. The Help Dialog Chat shows FAQs, search, and a contact form. Learn More

✅ Why Choose Echo Knowledge Base?

  • It’s an easy-to-use plugin for your WordPress website.
  • Choose from ready to use professional designs.
  • Match your theme with a simple visual Editor, no coding required.
  • Organize your articles and categories into five levels of hierarchy.
  • All essential features are free, plus get access control and more with add-ons.
  • Friendly and timely support from our team.

🚀 Add-ons Features

  • Control access and permissions based on groups, WordPress users and roles, and custom roles.
  • Control public and private articles and who can read, write, and edit articles.
  • Create unlimited Knowledge Bases with separate articles, categories, tags, and more.
  • Create Sidebar and Grid layouts.
  • Import articles and categories.
  • Vote on articles, add a feedback form, and learn from analytics.
  • Use widgets and shortcodes for categories, popular articles, and the search bar.
  • Replace articles with PDFs, external docs, video links, and more.
  • Filter search by category.
  • Use Advanced search analytics to determine the most popular and empty searches.
  • Migrate, create and copy articles and images from your Knowledge Base.

_____

💡 GO FURTHER WITH ADD-ONS

PRO Bundle
See our PRO Bundle.

Access Manager
Access Manager allows administrators, companies, and organizations to control and restrict access to their private Knowledge Base based on WordPress user accounts. Grant permission using roles and groups.

Elegant Layouts
Elegant Layouts adds Grid and Sidebar Layouts. Use Grid Layout or Sidebar Layout for KB Main page or combine Basic, Tabs, Grid and Sidebar layouts in a variety ways. Learn More.

Unlimited Knowledge Bases
Create Multiple Knowledge Bases, one for each product, service, topic or department. Each Knowledgebase has separate articles, URLs, KB Main Page and admin screens. Learn More.

Advanced Search
Enhance users search experience and view search analytics including popular searches and no results searches. Learn More.

Article Rating and Feedback
Enable users to provide valuable feedback on your articles. Collect analytics on the most and least rated articles. Learn More.

Widgets
Add Knowledgebase Search, Most Recent Articles and other Widgets and Shortcodes to your articles, sidebars and pages. Learn More.

Links Editor for PDFs and More
Set Articles to link to PDFs, pages, posts and websites. Learn More.

Articles Import and Export
Import and export articles and their content, comments, categories, tags, and attachments. Migrate and copy articles between KBs. Edit articles outside of WordPress. Learn More.

  • (PRO) Grid Layout – Demo 5 here
  • (PRO) Sidebar Layout – Demo 8 here
  • (PRO) Links – Demo 9 here

_____

⭐ OUR FREE COMPLEMENTARY PLUGINS ⭐

✅ The Help Dialog Chat offers a chatbot-like dialog for better customer support and increased leads and sales. The Help Dialog Chat includes FAQs, search, and a contact form. Learn More

✅ Creative Add-Ons for Elementor helps you write articles and documents faster and more easily using our powerful and practical Elementor widgets. Learn More

✅ Show IDs reveals IDs on admin screens, including posts, pages, custom post types and taxonomies, and others. Learn More

✅ The Content Down Arrow is coming soon.
sections.installation:
You can install the Knowledge Base for Documents and FAQs from your WordPress Dashboard or manually upload it through FTP.

OPTION 1: Install Knowledgebase Plugin from WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to Plugins -> Add New.
  2. Search for ‘Knowledge Base for Documents and FAQs’ and install the plugin.
  3. Activate the plugin in the Plugins menu.
  4. Optional step: configure the plugin in the Admin menu, in Knowledge Base -> KB Configuration page.

OPTION 2: Manually Upload Plugin Files

  1. Download the plugin file from the plugin page: echo-knowledge-base.zip.
  2. Unzip the file echo-knowledge-base.zip.
  3. Upload the ‘echo-knowledge-base’ folder to your ‘/wp-content/plugins’ directory (do not rename the folder).
  4. Optional step: configure the plugin in the Admin menu, in Knowledge Base -> KB Configuration page.
sections.faq:
Where can I find complete documentation on your knowledgebase?

Full searchable docs can be found at Knowledge Base

What is ChatGPT ?

Read about ChatGPT at ChatGPT

sections.reviews:
Well rounded, mature knowledge base and excellent support

By risingfire on April 5, 2024

I've been using Echo knowledge base for over a year now and just purchased a lifetime license. It's that good. The knowledge base features have worked flawlessly and any questions I have had during the setup process were answered promptly. The analytics provided has been extremely helpful in knowing what kind of questions my user base is asking and where I need to focus content. It's been an excellent tool and addition to my website!

Amazing

By websiteadm on December 13, 2023

I love the plugin and the support is amazing. I tried a few plugins before, but this is the best.

Superb plugin, incredible support

By sminfused on October 31, 2023

We’re building a large knowledge base & this plugin has been great to work with, easy to use, great documentation, with lots of great add on options - and truly great customer support! No hesitation to give this one 5 stars.

Great software and amazing support team!

By florianfr on August 9, 2023

Outstanding software and support, always eager to help very fast and accommodating!

We use the knowledge base for several years now with many different user groups, the access management is well thought through and easy to use.

Spectacular

By rpelletier on August 8, 2023

Very easy to setup and manage and their help dialog app is just as easy to set up. Hopefully they will develop a customer support app with canned answers that integrates with the KB. Then I will give them a sixth star!!!!!!

Fantastic Tool - Easy to Use, Great Customer Service

By nhscouting on August 4, 2023

Our nonprofit has worked with Echo Knowledge Base for several years to bring an easy-to-use knowledge base to our website. We continue returning to Echo Knowledge Base as our number one choice.

The customer service is top-notch!

Great plugin and fast support

By patricklacroix on August 4, 2023

With its intuitive interface, creating and organizing articles are very easy to do and so far, the responses from the technical support are fast. It's great.

Awesome plugin & support

By WorkinWP (iguanamom) on August 3, 2023

I use this plugin for a few sites I manage because it's attractive and gives so many options for displaying...I love it. When I had a minor issue with my FAQs not having hard returns in them, I reached out to support about it and was very happy with their fast response and simple resolution. Kudos to you all, will continue using your plugin going forward!

Klasse Plugin

By oberschwabe on July 25, 2023

… und der Support ist ebenfalls sehr freundlich und spitze.
Vielen Dank

Excellent product and documentation

By shoberman on July 18, 2023

The functionality is exactly what we were looking for, the documentation is excellent, and the support with the questions we have had in learning the tool has been fabulous. All around 5-stars.

short_description: Easily organize your knowledge base documentation, FAQs, and wiki with rich features and AI Writing Support.
description:
Our Knowledge Base plugin is a powerful documentation tool that helps you create and organize your documentation, FAQs, and articles. It’s easy to use and includes many features to help you build a visually appealing Knowledge Base.

Designed with a modern and professional appearance by default, it also offers numerous customization options to align with your brand’s identity. Features include premade designs, popular articles, a Table of Contents (TOC), FAQs, a navigation sidebar, analytics, and customizable archive pages.

Our articles are responsive and retina-ready, ensuring your knowledge base looks great on all devices.
